content.query:
CREATE DATABASE mydb 
    COLLATE Latin1_General_100_BIN2_UTF8;

SELECT
    TOP 100 *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://rfia2rawl2klisuspoc.dfs.core.windows.net/publicparquet/fares-data/',
        FORMAT = 'Parquet'
    ) AS [result]


SELECT
    TOP 100 *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://rfia2rawl2klisuspoc.dfs.core.windows.net/publicdelta/',
        FORMAT = 'DELTA'
    ) AS [result]


CREATE OR ALTER VIEW nycfares
AS 
SELECT *
FROM  
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://rfia2rawl2klisuspoc.dfs.core.windows.net/publicdelta/',
        FORMAT='DELTA'
    ) nyc;

select * from nycfares;
